General.Name: Cyon Exploration Ltd
General.Description: International Metals Mining Corp. acquires, explores for, and develops mineral properties in North America. It primarily explores for gold and copper deposits. The company was formerly known as Gold State Resources Inc. and changed its name to International Metals Mining Corp. in October 2022. International Metals Mining Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 404-999 Canada Place, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E2
